events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team is excited to review your experience and skills.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the backend developer role.
A recruiter from our engineering talent acquisition team has been assigned to manage your application and will contact you shortly.
You completed the initial screening call successfully, where we discussed your experience with software architecture and cloud technologies.
Thank you for your prompt response to the screening feedback. You expressed great enthusiasm and readiness for the next steps.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM UTC. Prepare to discuss coding exercises and system design.
You have successfully completed the technical interview. The interviewers appreciated your problem-solving approach and coding skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 12th at 10 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefit packages.
During the HR interview, you expressed alignment with our company values and a strong interest in long-term growth.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role, including a competitive salary and benefits package.
You have accepted the offer verbally and provided positive feedback about the interview process and the offer details.
You have officially accepted the job offer. We are excited to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with an introduction to our tools, team members, and project roadmaps.
The hiring process is now complete. You are officially part of our engineering team and ready to make an impact.
